original_text: These are the families of Issachar according to those that were numbered of them, threescore and four thousand and three hundred.
korean_text: 이는 잇사갈 종족들이니 계수된 자가 육만 사천삼백 명이었더라

sentences.original_text: These are the families of Issachar
according to those that were numbered of them
threescore and four thousand and three hundred
